vote.title: Authorize (1) a one-year service contract with Harmony Community Development Corporation in the an amount not to exceed of $300,000; (2) a one-year service contract with Under 1 Roof in the an amount not to exceed of $295,300; and (3) a one-year service contract with Crossroads Community Services, Inc. in the an amount not to exceed of $204,700, for programs to mitigate Drivers of Poverty for on behalf of the Office of Community Care - most advantageous proposers of fifteen - Total not to exceed $800,000 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize (1) a one-year service contract with Harmony Community Development Corporation in the an amount not to exceed of $300,000; (2) a one-year service contract with Under 1 Roof in the an amount not to exceed of $295,300; and (3) a one-year service contract with Crossroads Community Services, Inc. in the an amount not to exceed of $204,700, for programs to mitigate Drivers of Poverty for on behalf of the Office of Community Care - most advantageous proposers of fifteen - Total not to exceed $800,000 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
